original_text: And when the days of weeping for him were past, Joseph spoke to the household of Pharaoh, saying, “If now I have found favor in your eyes, please speak in the ears of Pharaoh, saying,
korean_text: 곡하는 기한이 지나매 요셉이 바로의 궁에 말하여 이르되 내가 너희에게 은혜를 입었으면 원하건대 바로의 귀에 아뢰기를

sentences.original_text: And when the days of weeping for him were past
Joseph spoke to the household of Pharaoh
If now I have found favor in your eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이제 당신들의 눈에 은혜를 입었다면

sentences.original_text: please speak in the ears of Pharaoh
